means: 基督的敌人，反对基督者

sentence.Network_en: And how would you react, then, if I told you I was the Antichrist?
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我告诉你我是个反基督者,你有何反应?

sentence.Network_en: They are well and properly sold to the darkness of the antichrist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们完全把自己出卖给了反基督的黑暗.

sentence.Network_en: See ninth Egyptian Plague . Exodus 10:21 - 22 Darkness upon Antichrist's kingdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 请参考埃及的第九灾. 出埃及记10:21-22黑暗降临敌基督的国.

means.word_mean: 1. (Christianity) the adversary of Christ (or Christianity) mentioned in the New Testament; the Antichrist will rule the world until overthrown by the Second Coming of Christ

auth_sentence.content: Any of the prophecies of the Revelation concerning Antichrist.
